verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Take <S%H3947><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him, and the garments <S%H899><s%> and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> and the bull <S%H6499><s%> of the sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> rams <S%H352><s%> and the basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread; <S%H4682><s%>
and assemble <S%H6950><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting. <S%H4150><s%> "

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him. When the congregation <S%H5712><s%> was assembled <S%H6950><s%> at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> "This <S%H2088><s%> is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> to do. <S%H6213><s%>"
Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> had Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> come <S%H7126><s%> near, <S%H7126><s%> and washed <S%H7364><s%> them with water. <S%H4325><s%>

And he put <S%H5414><s%> the tunic <S%H3801><s%> on him and girded <S%H2296><s%> him with the sash, <S%H73><s%> and clothed <S%H3847><s%> him with the robe, <S%H4598><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the ephod <S%H646><s%> on him; and he girded <S%H2296><s%> him with the artistic <S%H2805><s%> band <S%H2805><s%> of the ephod, <S%H646><s%> with which he tied <S%H640><s%> [it] to him.
He then placed <S%H7760><s%> the breastpiece <S%H2833><s%> on him, and in the breastpiece <S%H2833><s%> he put <S%H5414><s%> the Urim <S%H224><s%> and the Thummim. <S%H8550><s%>

He also placed <S%H7760><s%> the turban <S%H4701><s%> on his head, <S%H7218><s%> and on the turban, <S%H4701><s%> at its front, <S%H6440><s%> he placed <S%H7760><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> plate, <S%H6731><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> crown, <S%H5145><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> then took <S%H3947><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> and anointed <S%H4886><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that was in it, and consecrated <S%H6942><s%> them.

And he sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of it on the altar <S%H4196><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> and anointed <S%H4886><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> its utensils, <S%H3627><s%> and the basin <S%H3595><s%> and its stand, <S%H3653><s%> to consecrate <S%H6942><s%> them.
Then he poured <S%H3332><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> on Aaron's head <S%H7218><s%> and anointed <S%H4886><s%> him, to consecrate <S%H6942><s%> him.

Next Moses <S%H4872><s%> had Aaron's sons <S%H1121><s%> come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> and clothed <S%H3847><s%> them with tunics, <S%H3801><s%> and girded <S%H2296><s%> them with sashes, <S%H73><s%> and bound <S%H2280><s%> caps <S%H4021><s%> on them, just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Then he brought <S%H5066><s%> the bull <S%H6499><s%> of the sin <S%H9128><s%> offering, <S%H9128><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the bull <S%H6499><s%> of the sin <S%H9128><s%> offering. <S%H9128><s%>

Next Moses <S%H4872><s%> slaughtered <S%H7819><s%> [it] and took <S%H3947><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> and with his finger <S%H676><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> [some of it] around <S%H5439><s%> on the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and purified <S%H2398><s%> the altar. <S%H4196><s%> Then he poured <S%H3332><s%> out [the rest of] the blood <S%H1818><s%> at the base <S%H3247><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> and consecrated <S%H6942><s%> it, to make <S%H3722><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> for it.

He also took <S%H3947><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> that was on the entrails <S%H7130><s%> and the lobe <S%H3508><s%> of the liver, <S%H3516><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%> and their fat; <S%H2459><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> offered <S%H6999><s%> it up in smoke <S%H6999><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

But the bull <S%H6499><s%> and its hide <S%H5785><s%> and its flesh <S%H1320><s%> and its refuse, <S%H6569><s%> he burned <S%H8313><s%> in the fire <S%H784><s%> outside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Then he presented <S%H7126><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> of the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H5930><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram. <S%H352><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> slaughtered <S%H7819><s%> [it] and sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

When he had cut <S%H5408><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> into its pieces, <S%H5409><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> offered <S%H6999><s%> up the head <S%H7218><s%> and the pieces <S%H5409><s%> and the suet <S%H6309><s%> in smoke. <S%H6999><s%>

After he had washed <S%H7364><s%> the entrails <S%H7130><s%> and the legs <S%H3767><s%> with water, <S%H4325><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> offered <S%H6999><s%> up the whole <S%H3605><s%> ram <S%H352><s%> in smoke <S%H6999><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%> It was a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering <S%H5930><s%> for a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma; <S%H7381><s%> it was an offering <S%H801><s%> by fire <S%H801><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Then he presented <S%H7126><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> of ordination; <S%H4394><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> laid <S%H5564><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> on the head <S%H7218><s%> of the ram. <S%H352><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> slaughtered <S%H7819><s%> [it] and took <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of its blood <S%H1818><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it on the lobe <S%H8571><s%> of Aaron's right <S%H3233><s%> ear, <S%H241><s%> and on the thumb <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and on the big <S%H931><s%> toe <S%H931><s%> of his right <S%H3233><s%> foot. <S%H7272><s%>

He also had Aaron's sons <S%H1121><s%> come <S%H7126><s%> near; <S%H7126><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> put <S%H5414><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> on the lobe <S%H8571><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> ear, <S%H241><s%> and on the thumb <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> hand, <S%H3027><s%> and on the big <S%H931><s%> toe <S%H931><s%> of their right <S%H3233><s%> foot. <S%H7272><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> then sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> [the rest of] the blood <S%H1818><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And he took <S%H3947><s%> the fat, <S%H2459><s%> and the fat <S%H451><s%> tail, <S%H451><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> that was on the entrails, <S%H7130><s%> and the lobe <S%H3508><s%> of the liver <S%H3516><s%> and the two <S%H8147><s%> kidneys <S%H3629><s%> and their fat <S%H2459><s%> and the right <S%H3225><s%> thigh. <S%H7785><s%>

And from the basket <S%H5536><s%> of unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread <S%H4682><s%> that was before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> he took <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cake <S%H2471><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> cake <S%H2471><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%> [mixed with] oil <S%H8081><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> wafer, <S%H7550><s%> and placed <S%H7760><s%> [them] on the portions <S%H2459><s%> of fat <S%H2459><s%> and on the right <S%H3225><s%> thigh. <S%H7785><s%>

He then put <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> [these] on the hands <S%H3709><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> and on the hands <S%H3709><s%> of his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and presented <S%H5130><s%> them as a wave <S%H8573><s%> offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> them from their hands <S%H3709><s%> and offered <S%H6999><s%> them up in smoke <S%H6999><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> with the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering. <S%H5930><s%> They were an ordination <S%H4394><s%> offering <S%H4394><s%> for a soothing <S%H5207><s%> aroma; <S%H7381><s%> it was an offering <S%H801><s%> by fire <S%H801><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> also took <S%H3947><s%> the breast <S%H2373><s%> and presented <S%H5130><s%> it for a wave <S%H8573><s%> offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> it was Moses <S%H4872><s%>' portion <S%H4490><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%> of ordination, <S%H4394><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses.

So Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> and some <S%H4480><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and sprinkled <S%H5137><s%> it on Aaron, <S%H175><s%> on his garments, <S%H899><s%> on his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and on the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him; and he consecrated <S%H6942><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> his garments, <S%H899><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and the garments <S%H899><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> with him.

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> "Boil <S%H1310><s%> the flesh <S%H1320><s%> at the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> it there <S%H8033><s%> together with the bread <S%H3899><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the basket <S%H5536><s%> of the ordination <S%H4394><s%> offering, <S%H4394><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as I commanded, <S%H6680><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> it.'
"And the remainder <S%H3498><s%> of the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and of the bread <S%H3899><s%> you shall burn <S%H8313><s%> in the fire. <S%H784><s%>

"And you shall not go <S%H3318><s%> outside <S%H3318><s%> the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> for seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that the period <S%H3117><s%> of your ordination <S%H4394><s%> is fulfilled; <S%H4390><s%> for he will ordain <S%H4390><s%> <S%H3027><s%> you through seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> as has been done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> to make <S%H3722><s%> atonement <S%H3722><s%> on your behalf. <S%H5921><s%>

"At the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting, <S%H4150><s%> moreover, you shall remain <S%H3427><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> for seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> that you may not die, <S%H4191><s%> for so <S%H3651><s%> I have been commanded. <S%H6680><s%>"

Thus Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the things <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> through <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
